methodology: Realistic Platform Comparison for B2B Outreach

executive_summary.meta_ads_verdict: Excelente para RESEARCH e PREPARATION, LIMITADO para OUTREACH direto
executive_summary.google_ads_verdict: SUPERIOR para OUTREACH devido a urgency financeira e domains
executive_summary.recommended_approach: Hybrid: Google Ads para leads primários, Meta Ads para research complementar

major_advantages: Análise semântica sofisticada de pain points
Quantificação de waste e revenue impact
critical_limitations: ZERO dados de contato direto (email, telefone)
Necessita research manual para encontrar contatos
Dados baseados apenas em ads públicos

OutreachViability(business_name='advantageautoglassrepair', platform_source='Meta Ads', contact_accessibility='BLOCKED', pain_points_identified=['Messaging sophistication deficit', 'Urgency desperation in ads'], financial_impact_quantified=True, technical_problems_specified=True, implementation_roadmap_exists=True, urgency_level='LOW', personalization_depth='MODERATE', outreach_angle='Sophistication & waste reduction approach', realistic_success_probability=0.3847375)
best_use_cases: Research inicial para identificar pain points
Análise de waste patterns para cold approach

critical_limitations: Ainda necessita research para contatos específicos
Dados focados apenas em grandes spenders
Sem informações de decision makers diretos

OutreachViability(business_name='Smile Design Dental Studio', platform_source='Google Ads Transparency', contact_accessibility='MODERATE', pain_points_identified=['Attribution tracking crisis', 'Mobile conversion issues'], financial_impact_quantified=True, technical_problems_specified=True, implementation_roadmap_exists=False, urgency_level='HIGH', personalization_depth='SURFACE', outreach_angle='Financial urgency: $9,400/month waste', realistic_success_probability=0.5688)
best_use_cases: Cold outreach baseado em urgency financeira
Follow-up em companies com crisis indicators

contact_accessibility.reasoning: Meta Ads fornece apenas page_id, Google Ads fornece domínios

pain_point_specificity.reasoning: Meta Ads tem análise semântica mais profunda de waste patterns

financial_quantification.reasoning: Google Ads quantifica waste em $ específicos vs estimates do Meta

urgency_indicators.reasoning: Google Ads identifica crises financeiras vs inefficiencies do Meta

implementation_guidance.reasoning: Meta Ads fornece roadmaps fase-por-fase específicos

for_cold_outreach.reasoning: Financial urgency + domains = higher response rates

for_warm_outreach.reasoning: Detailed pain analysis allows sophisticated positioning
for_warm_outreach.suggested_approach: Use implementation roadmaps as conversation framework

for_enterprise_sales.reasoning: Crisis indicators create genuine urgency for decision making
for_enterprise_sales.suggested_approach: Technical audit angle with immediate financial impact
